channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Canva launches its own design model, adds new AI features to the platform
item.description: Canva is launching new features like Forms and email design, and it makes Affinity free for all users.

item.title: 8 Best Gaming Laptops (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We tested the latest and greatest gaming laptops—from portable machines to an 18-inch monster—so you can level up your game anywhere.

item.title: Threads now lets you approve and filter your replies
item.description: While Threads already offers tools that let you limit replies to people you follow, your followers, or people you mention, the new feature allows you ...

item.title: Our Favorite Cordless Stick Vacuum Is Marked Down $50
item.description: This discount brings the Bissell PowerClean FurFinder down to under $200.

item.title: Bevel raises $10M Series A from General Catalyst for its AI health companion
item.description: Bevel's AI health companion unifies data from wearables and daily habits across sleep, fitness, and nutrition into personalized insights.

item.title: Canva launches its own design model, adds new AI features to the platform
item.description: Canva is launching new features like Forms and email design, and it makes Affinity free for all users.

item.title: Figma acquires AI-powered media generation company Weavy
item.description: Figma said that Weavy will exist as a stand-alone product for now and that, in the future, it will be integrated with the Figma Weave brand, along wit...

item.title: ICE Wants to Build a Shadow Deportation Network in Texas
item.description: A new ICE proposal outlines a 24/7 transport operation run by armed contractors—turning Texas into the logistical backbone of an industrialized deport...

item.title: “I Sweated So Much I Never Needed to Pee”: Life in China’s Relentless Gig Economy
item.description: In his newly translated memoir I Deliver Parcels in Beijing, Hu Anyan captures the brutal labor and quiet grace of life at the edge of China’s booming...

item.title: Google partners with Ambani’s Reliance to offer free AI Pro access to millions of Jio users in India
